document_data.name: Kiirma Blackmane
document_data.mainbody: '''Kiirma Blackmane''' was the cloakmaster of [[Riatavin]] for the [[Shadow Thieves]]. She was also a senior agent of the [[Moonstars]] (Tel'Teukiira) in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.Description: Kiirma posed as an ordinary wealthy widow and businesswoman.
document_data.Abilities: She was an accomplished [[thief]] and a highly trained [[wizard]]. She was a former apprentice of [[Khelben Arunsun]].
document_data.Possessions: Kiirma Blackmane owned several taverns, boarding houses, and festhalls in the town of [[Riatavin]] which gave her income as well as being a front for more shady activities. She kept her spellcasting abilities secret by being very discreet and using her ''[[ring of translocation]]'' which allowed her to choose the point of origin for any spells she cast, up to 30 ft (9.1 m) away from her.
document_data.Activities: Kiirma was the cloakmaster of Riatavin in the Shadow Thieves, an organized crime syndicate which in [[1370 DR]] had a monopoly on the criminal activity in the town. Unbeknownst to them, she was also a senior agent for the Tel'Teukiira.
document_data.Relationships:
As a former apprentice of Khelben Arunsun, she was loyal to him and his organization, passing necessary information about the Shadow Thieves to the Tel'Teukiira. However, she did not reciprocate: she never relayed news of the Moonstars to the [[Shadow Council|Shade Council]].

Kiirma commanded the loyalty of all her guildmasters except for [[Rekx Tihler]].
document_data.History: Kiirma was a former apprentice of [[Khelben Arunsun]], and his choice to make her a senior agent of the Tel'Teukiira was questioned by the other senior agents because she was a high-ranking member of the Shadow Thieves.
